text: Nevertheless, the king of Assyria sent the Tartan,18:17 Hebrew Tartan is the title of a field marshal, general, or commander in the Assyrian military. the Rabsaris,18:17 Hebrew Rabsaris is the title of the chief eunuch in the Assyrian military. and the Rabshakeh,18:17 Hebrew Rabshakeh is the title of a high-ranking Assyrian military officer; here and throughout chapters 18 and 19, as well as Isaiah 36 and 37. along with a great army, from Lachish to King Hezekiah at Jerusalem.
